fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.cps.components

Class RandomValueProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.cps.components.RandomValueProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentI

    public class RandomValueProvider
extends AbstractComponent
    The class ValueProvider defines a component implementing the integer value providing service defined by the interface ValueProvidingI by returning a random int value.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2018-03-17

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
